section.title: JHotDraw 6
section.para: JHotDraw 6 is an evolutionary step from the JHotDraw versions 1 to 5. Code from prior versions is portable to JHotDraw 6.

listitem.para: Provides an application framework for drawing editors
A figure, which depends on the state of other figures, automatically updates its state.
The code makes use of Java 2 language features and the Java 1.2 SE API.
The framework is built on top of the Java AWT class library and its design principles.
Mini usage studies of the framework 'Mini'

section.para: The design and the majority of the JHotDraw 6 code was developed by Erich Gamma.
